physical_appearance:\This is a set containing a tea cup and a saucer. They both depict Saint Ignatius of Loyola. The saint is dressed in a chasuble
 and in his left hand holds a volume of the abbreviated Jesuit motto \\Ad Maiorem Dei Gloriam\\. Symbolic of his elevated status
